name: Gradient
desc: A color gradient represented as an array of color stops, each having a parametric location value.

items.name: init(colors: [Color])
items.desc: Creates a gradient from an array of colors.

items.name: init(stops: [Gradient.Stop])
items.desc: Creates a gradient from an array of color stops.

items.name: struct Stop
items.desc: One color stop in the gradient.

items.name: static func == (Gradient, Gradient) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two gradients are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two gradients are unequal.
